snippet: The Cassatt String Quartet’s performance at Bargemusic on Sunday was a program of works by Dvorak, Beethoven and Franck.
abstract: Corinna da Fonseca-Wollheim reviews performance by Cassatt String Quartet at Bargemusic.
lead_paragraph: The Cassatt String Quartet’s performance at Bargemusic on Sunday was a program of works by Dvorak, Beethoven and Franck.

headline.seo: The Cassatt String Quartet at Bargemusic
headline.main: Striving for a Delicate Balance, Even in Times of Change
headline.print_headline: Striving for a Delicate Balance, Even in Times of Change
